short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize YouTube Videos. Get direct links to key points in the video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No subscription needed. Use your Anthropic API key & Claude 3.5 Sonnet to summarize YouTube videos.

Feedback welcome üôè hi@ytsum.io

Instructions:
- Click the extension icon and enter your API key
- Open a YouTube video, scroll down a little, the extension box should appear above the comments section
- Click fetch transcript (if auto fetch is enabled you can skip this step)
- Click analyze transcript (this does not happen automatically)

Known issues:
- Token counter is still slightly off (in general the estimate is higher than the actual usage)
- Fails sometimes, if the response from the API isn't perfectly formed
- Does not work with extremely long videos due to token limits

Recently fixed:
- Doesn't require a reload anymore to show up on page
